name: Design System Organizer
description:
Manage names with /'s like folders. Copy styles between files. Bulk relink instances and styles to new masters with the same names.

► Manage names with multiple /'s ► Transfer and Relink


→ Quickly reorganize and clean up a huge library

with multiple names like "icons/small/actions/group"


→ Copy styles between files and bulk relink

all used styles to the duplicated library


→ Copy components between files and bulk relink 

used instances to new masters


→ Create a duplicate version of the design system

and relink all mockups to the new copy


→ Clone components and styles in one click

when only a few parameters need to be changed


FEATURES


1. Manage paths such as “components/input/outlined” through a folder-like interface with bulk renaming on behind.


→ Organize groups: group, ungroup, move to, drag and drop

→ Rename group

→ Remove styles

→ Clone styles and components


2. Organize styles and components between files.


→ Copy styles between files via clipboard (export/import)

→ Bulk relink styles to another style library with the same style names

→ Bulk relink instances to another components library with the same master names

→ Support for local and external libraries

→ Apply a relink to a selection, page or entire document


AND EVEN MORE


→ Context menu and shortcuts (select all, delete, rename, group and more)

→ Shift + click for multiple selection

→ Supports all types of styles

→ Supports variants for components


TRIAL


You have a 15-day free trial for each new file with new components and 3 free trials for relink and export/import styles. During the trial period, the ability to select target and styles is limited to 5.


Please do not copy components from the file where the trial period ended, this will decrease the period of the new file.


LICENSE


Pay once, use forever! To purchase a license please visit our Product Page on Gumroad. Feel free to contact us if you need a discount for any reason. 


FEEDBACK


If you have a great idea feel free to contact us by email dso-support@floweare.com. You can also use this email to report suspected bugs in DSO plugin.
